required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Entonox on Stages of Labor in Nulliparous Women
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Entonox on Stages of Labor in Nulliparous Women :a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: This Trial study about The effect of Entonox associated with duration of labor in Active phase and efficacy for relief pain of labor .So investigators start to study up to 14 months

detailed_description.textblock: Investigators will enroll participants in 2 groups by randomized . First group will inhale Entonox and the second group not receive any gas . The participants in Entonox group will inhale gas in 4-5 times for each uterine contraction and Nurse will measure blood pressure , O2 saturation ,pain score before use gas . The outcome,investigators study about Apgar score , duration of labor , pain relief in both group,route of delivery and estimated blood loss

primary_outcome.measure: Effect of Entonox for duration of labor
primary_outcome.description: Study about duration of labor after receive Entonox in active phase of labor

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of patients who inhaled Entonox for pain relieve
secondary_outcome.description: % of patients relieve pain after inhaled Entonox , Investigators measure by visual analogue scale

arm_group.description: Inhalation Entonox in active phase of labor ( cervical dilatation more than 5 cm ) Inhaled Entonox before true uterine contraction in 30 sec , inhaled in 4-5 times for 1 contraction
Not receive any gas when archive in active phase of labor( cervical dilatation more than 5 cm )

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Nulliparity
- Age 18 years old or more
- Gestational age 37-40+6 wks
- Singleton
- Cephalic presentation
- Cervical dilatation > 5 cm
- Estimated fetal weight 2,500-4,000 gm
Exclusion Criteria:
- Estimated fetal weight more than 4,000 gm
- High risk pregnancy (Hypertension in pregnancy ,Endocrine disorder , autoimmune disorder , epilsepsy etc)
- SpO2 < 95 %
- Contraindication for Entonox usage ( Severe head injury , asthma , Pulmonary disease,Otitis media )
- Drug allergy : Metoclopramide , Dimenhydrinate , Pethidine ,Entonox
